014package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal;
015
016import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.function.Supplier;
022import java.util.stream.Collector;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
026
027@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
028public final class CollectionCollectors {
029    private static final Supplier<Collector> SET_COLLECTOR = setFactory();
030
031    private CollectionCollectors() {}
032
033    private static Supplier<Collector> setFactory() {
034        try {
035            MethodHandle mh = MethodHandles.publicLookup()
036                    .findStatic(Collectors.class, "toUnmodifiableSet", MethodType.methodType(Collector.class));
037            return Unchecked.supplier(() -> (Collector) mh.invokeExact());
038        } catch (final ReflectiveOperationException ignore) {
039            // ignored for java 8+9 compat
040        }
041        return () -> Collectors.collectingAndThen(
042                Collectors.toSet(),
043                Collections::unmodifiableSet);
044    }
045
046    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
047    public static <T> Collector<T, ?, Set<T>> toUnmodifiableSet() {
048        return SET_COLLECTOR.get();
049    }
050}
